scripts.build: build(){ cp src/view/index.html $1/index.html; browserify --debug --detect-globals false --no-builtins src/view/Canvas.js -o $1/Canvas.js; }; build
scripts.gitpage: npm run build docs GoogleAnalytics; cp src/view/googleAnalytics.js docs
scripts.buildWindows: rd /s /q docs && mkdir docs && xcopy /s src\ docs\src\ && xcopy /s experiments\ docs\experiments\
